amendment.description: To uphold Second Amendment rights and prevent the United States from entering into the United Nations Arms Trade Treaty.

vote.text: Amendment SA 139 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 91.

action.text: Amendment SA 139 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Inhofe.
